cwmp.description: Configure the ACS parameters, used by icwmp

options.name: url
options.description: URL of ACS server

options.name: userid
options.description: Username for ACS server connection

options.name: passwd
options.description: Password for ACS server connection

options.name: periodic_inform_enable
options.description: If set to **1**, the CPE must periodically open session with ACS by sending Inform message to the ACS.

options.name: periodic_inform_interval
options.description: The duration in seconds of the interval for which the CPE must attempt to connect with the ACS and call the Inform method.

options.name: periodic_inform_time
options.description: An absolute time reference to determine when the CPE will initiate the periodic Inform method calls.

options.name: dhcp_discovery
options.description: if set to **enable**, the CPE will get the url of ACS from DHCP server Option 43.

options.name: compression
options.description: if set to **1**, the CPE must use the HTTP Compression when communicating with the ACS.

options.name: retry_min_wait_interval
options.description: The minimum wait interval for session retry (in seconds)

options.name: retry_interval_multiplier
options.description: The retry interval multiplier for session retry session as described in the standard.

options.name: https_ssl_capath
options.description: The path of ssl certificates. ssl certificates used for Upload and Download methods.

options.name: ipv6_enable
options.description: Enables IPv6 in cwmp

options.name: ssl_capath
options.description: The path of ssl certificates for TR-069 sessions.

options.name: insecure_enable
options.description: if set to **1**, the CPE skips validation of the ACS certificates.

options.name: http_disable_100continue
options.description: if set to **1**, disables the http 100 continue behaviour.

options.name: dhcp_url
options.description: the **url** of ACS server received from the DHCP server via Option 43. This parameter is automatically updated by daemon, When **'dhcp_discovery'** option is enabled.

options.name: ip_version
options.description: ip_version of ConnectionRequestURL

options.name: interface
options.description: Configure the Layer3 device interface name to use for connecting to ACS.

options.name: default_wan_interface
options.description: Configure the default wan interface of the device.

options.name: log_to_console
options.description: If set to **1**, the log messages will be shown in the console/stdout.

options.name: log_to_file
options.description: If set to **1**, the log messages will be saved in the log file.

options.name: log_severity
options.description: Specifies the log type to use, by default **'INFO'**. The possible types are **'EMERG', 'ALERT', 'CRITIC' ,'ERROR', 'WARNING', 'NOTICE', 'INFO' and 'DEBUG'**.

options.name: log_file_name
options.description: Specifies the path of the log file, by default **'/var/log/icwmpd.log'**.

options.name: log_max_size
options.description: Size of the log file. The default value is **102400**.

options.name: userid
options.description: The username of the device used in a connection request from ACS to CPE.

options.name: passwd
options.description: The password of the device when sending a connection request from ACS to CPE.

options.name: port
options.description: The port used for connection request.

options.name: ubus_socket
options.description: Specifies the path of the ubus socket.

options.name: provisioning_code
options.description: Specifies the primary service provider and other provisioning information, which may be used by the ACS to determine service provider-specific customization and provisioning parameters.

options.name: amd_version
options.description: Configure the amendment version to use.

options.name: instance_mode
options.description: Configure the instance mode to use. Supported instance modes are : InstanceNumber and InstanceNumber.

options.name: session_timeout
options.description: Represents the number of seconds that should be used by the ACS as the amount of time to wait before timing out a CWMP session due to the CPE not responding.

options.name: notification
options.description: If set to **1**, it enables the notification feature.

options.name: exec_download
options.description: If set to **1**, Specifies if Download method is executed.

options.name: log_to_syslog
options.description: If set to **1**, the cwmp log will be appended to busybox syslog.

options.name: periodic_notify_enable
options.description: If set to **1**, icwmp will be able to detect parameter value change at any time.

options.name: periodic_notify_interval
options.description: Interval in sec to check for value change notifications

options.name: forced_inform_json
options.description: Define absolute path for the JSON containing additional parameters as forced inform parameter. See readme for examples.

options.name: boot_inform_json
options.description: Define absolute path for the JSON containing additional parameters as boot inform parameter. These parameters only gets added if the notify event is '0 Bootstrap' or '1 Boot'. To enable value change notification, please use custom_notify_json, See readme for examples.

options.name: custom_notify_json
options.description: Define absolute path of the JSON containing parameters on which notification get enabled as per the definition. See readme for examples.

options.name: enable
options.description: if set to **1**, the Lightweight Notifications will be enabled.

options.name: hostname
options.description: The hostname or address to be used when sending the UDP Lightweight Notifications.

options.name: port
options.description: The port number to be used when sending UDP Lightweight Notifications.
